abstract: Deer-car collisions are down, an analysis found, but the average cost of damage caused has risen.
snippet: Deer-car collisions are down, an analysis found, but the average cost of damage caused has risen.
lead_paragraph: As I was driving my children home from an after-school activity recently, I had to brake as a herd of deer sauntered across the road in the dusk, their eyes glinting in the glare of my headlights. My children were thrilled to see them, but I was quietly relieved I had seen them in time to stop.

headline.main: Deer-Car Collisions Are Less Frequent, but More Costly
